reviewtext: I have carried this binoculars EVERYWHERE I went for ALL occasions. Let me tell you this is one of the BEST thing I have ever done for myself since I love Nature Watch, Sports and Concert event. This tiny compact yet POWERFUL binocular fit in my one palm size, very light, durable, cool design, and it serves its purpose. WHY in the world would you spend more bucks for these clumsy ugly big heavy kind ??? I am more than happy with this item~! YEAH~!!!
summary: POWERFUL, tiny, and I LOVE IT~!!!!!
